statements.select: SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.GroupID , AA.RoleID , AA.UseYn FROM dbo.TGroupRole AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.GroupID , AA.RoleID , AA.UseYn FROM dbo.TGroupRole AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.GroupID = #GroupID# AND AA.RoleID = #RoleID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TGroupRole ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, GroupID, RoleID, UseYn ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #GroupID#, #RoleID#, #UseYn# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:

, GroupID = #GroupID# , RoleID = #RoleID# , UseYn = #UseYn# WHERE ID = #ID#
